text: [Vspomni,] kak my sdelali Mekkanskiy dom mestom sbora i pribezhishchem dlya lyudey. Sdelayte zhe mesto stoyaniya Ibrakhima mestom sversheniya molitvy. My poveleli Ibrakhimu i Ismailu: "Soderzhite v chistote moy dom dlya sovershayushchikh obkhod vokrug nego, dlya uyedinyayushchikhsya, preklonyayushchikhsya i padayushchikh nits
